thread.title: Puppy born without front legs refuses to give up on life (8 Photos)
thread.title_full: Puppy born without front legs refuses to give up on life (8 Photos)

author: Matt
title: Puppy born without front legs refuses to give up on life (8 Photos)
text:
Nubby had to be fed at a certain angle so as to avoid aspiration pneumonia (inhalation of liquids and gases into the lungs) and would frequently fall into bouts illness due to an “esophageal abnormality.”. 
“He had a pocket form in his esophagus that was trapping his milk,” says Robinson. 3 Lou Robinson 
Nubby was given a heavy duty of antibiotics and place inside an oxygen tank. 
“He was not giving up. He was fighting,” continued Robinson. “And as long as he has a chance at quality of life, we will fight to give him that chance.” 4 
And, while Nubby appears to be doing better, Robinson isn’t taking anything for granted, saying she has ‘no idea’ if Nubby will ever get over his health problems. 
Yet for now, Nubby is still hanging on in there. 
After all, life finds a way. 5
